subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
Basketball
College Athletics
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Stanford Coach Tara VanDerveer and her Cardinal had hoped to end UConn’s winning streak, but fell short after a strong first half in Tuesday’s N.C.A.A. women’s national final.
snippet: Stanford Coach Tara VanDerveer and her Cardinal had hoped to end UConn’s winning streak, but fell short after a strong first half in Tuesday’s N.C.A.A. women’s national final.
